Event.Message: The machine %2 successfully joined the domain %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DomainName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ComputerName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The machine %2 attempted to join the domain %1 but failed. The error code was %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DomainName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ComputerName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetStatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
During domain join, the domain controller contacted found an existing computer account in Active Directory with the same name. An attempt to re-use this account was permitted.
Domain controller searched: %1 Existing computer account DN: %2
See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2202145 for more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DomainName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ComputerName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
During domain join, the domain controller contacted found an existing computer account in Active Directory with the same name. An attempt to re-use this account was prevented for security reasons.
Domain controller searched: %1 Existing computer account DN: %2 The error code was %3.
See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2202145 for more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DomainName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ComputerName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetStatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
